Longus capitis
``` ::: ::: ## Origin {#origin} C3-C6 (TP, ant tubercles) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Insertion {#insertion} Occipital bone (basilar part) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Innervation {#innervation} Direct branches from cervical plexus (C1-C3) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 ## Action {#action} - **Bilateral**: Flexes head - **Unilateral**: Flexes and slight I/L rotation # Muscle groups Longus capitis is part of the [prevertebral muscle group]({{< var ref-oians.path >}}) # Palpation # Clinical significance
